instructions.content: Implement proper state management patterns (Redux, Vuex, NgRx) for complex applications. Avoid prop drilling and ensure predictable state updates.
Ensure full mobile responsiveness with touch-friendly interfaces, proper viewport settings, and performance optimization for mobile devices.
Implement Progressive Web App features with service workers, offline functionality, push notifications, and app-like experience. Use web app manifest and implement proper caching strategies.
Build reusable, composable components with clear interfaces and single responsibilities. Implement proper component lifecycle management and state isolation.

Translate visual designs into functional code efficiently. Convert high-fidelity mockups from Figma or sketches into HTML, CSS, and component-based code (React, Vue). Focus on maintaining design fidelity while ensuring responsive behavior and accessibility.

Generate specific UI components with clear requirements and specifications. Focus on proper state management, accessibility compliance, and reusability. Always review generated components for UX best practices before integration.

Use browser developer tools effectively for debugging frontend issues. Analyze network requests, inspect DOM changes, profile performance, and debug JavaScript execution. Implement proper error boundaries and logging for production debugging.
Integrate user feedback mechanisms with analytics, surveys, and user testing. Implement feedback loops to continuously improve user experience based on real usage data.
Design user-friendly error experiences with clear messages, recovery suggestions, and graceful degradation. Avoid technical jargon and provide actionable next steps for users.
Implement proper loading states with progress indicators, skeleton screens, and optimistic updates. Provide feedback for long-running operations and allow cancellation when appropriate.
Design effective user onboarding with progressive disclosure, interactive tutorials, and clear value proposition. Minimize time to first value and provide contextual help.
